summary: A young Nigerian man on the verge of being in an arranged marriage, suddenly questions his situation after an encounter with a stunning Latin woman, who is also about to be married.
cast: Tunde Adebimpe|Raul A. Reyes|Alan Gryfe|Amy Sedaris|Arthur Anderson|Leisa Heintzelman|Isiah Whitlock Jr.|Natalia Verbeke|Hippolyte Girardot|Murielle Arden|James Wilby|Kaili Vernoff|William Barry|Carole Bayeux|Gene Ruffini|Patricia Mauceri|Cherie Jimenez|Abiola Abrams|Deen Badarou|Anthony Genco|Charles Temo|Paul Galvin|Tahnesha Hawkins|Shaad Rashad|Alia Raza
title: Jump Tomorrow
